tasks.instruction:
Fix the following issues in the About section through Contact section:

1. Enhance background animations:
   - Make sure the background elements have proper animations as the user scrolls
   - Implement more visible parallax effects on the background elements
   - Ensure the background animations are smooth and visible without interfering with text readability

2. Fix text problems at the end of the About section:
   - Identify and fix any text that may be overlapping, misaligned, or improperly formatted
   - Ensure proper spacing and padding around text elements
   - Check for any readability issues with text color against the background
   - Verify that all text appears and animates correctly when scrolling

Working directory: /workspace/uploads/workspace/shadcn-ui/src
